segments.text: I know I'm a blabbermouth , but what do you think she should do , John ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Honey , we're in the museum now . We're not here to discuss your coworker's love life . We're here to enjoy the great paintings by Picasso !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I know ! But it's really important to her ! Her whole life could be ruined by this man !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You're making a federal case out of it . One unhealthy love affair can't ruin anything . It could even make your life more interesting .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: All I'm trying to say is that life is ... like ... er ... this painting .
segments.speaker: S2
